entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 23 this afternoon. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 23 this afternoon. Wind chill near minus 30. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 29. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Clearing before morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 before morning. Low minus 29. Wind chill minus 30 this evening and minus 41 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Thursday 26 January 2023
